## Welcome

PGEforge is a community-built resource for enhancing common software tools in *Plasmodium* genomic epidemiology with tutorials and analysis workflows. 

## A community-led effort

Most of these resources were developed at the [RADISH23 Hackathon](website_docs/radish23.qmd) by the following [contributors](website_docs/contributors.qmd).
